text: Enrique Pinti (October 7, 1939 - March 27, 2022) was an Argentine comedian and actor. His career began in 1957. Pinti was born in Buenos Aires, Argentina. He was known for his roles in Juan que reía (1976), Esperando la carroza (1985), Flop (1990), Perdido por perdido (1993), Tango (1998), and in Arregui, la noticia del día (2001). Pinti was openly gay. He died on March 27, 2022 at a Buenos Aires hospital from problems caused by diabetes at the age of 82.Murió Enrique Pinti Concern for the health of Enrique Pinti: he is delicate ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1939 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Argentine movie actors Category:LGBT actors Category:LGBT comedians Category:Gay men Category:Actors from Buenos Aires Category:Argentine stage actors Category:Argentine television actors Category:Deaths from diabetes
title: Enrique Pinti
